about_the_game: This unit pack includes unit art for wartime vehicles that never saw a production line. From advanced warplane designs to theoretical battle vehicles, this unit pack adds even more alternate history flavour with technological marvels and oddities that could have changed the course of the war.
detailed_description:
Hearts of Iron IV: Expansion Pass 1


About the Game

This unit pack includes unit art for wartime vehicles that never saw a production line. From advanced warplane designs to theoretical battle vehicles, this unit pack adds even more alternate history flavour with technological marvels and oddities that could have changed the course of the war.
